OBJECTIVE 

 

Seeking a position in the marketing sector where my sales skills can be utilized within a competitive working 

environment aiding to showcase my expertise, skills and qualifications. 

 

PROFILE SNAPSHOT 

 

 MBA with 2 year and 4 months of experience in sales and business development in Domestic and 
International Market.

 An effective communicator with good interpersonal and presentation skills.  

 Dealt in Domestic sales (B2B) and International Sales (B2C). 

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 

Company: INFO EDGE INDIA LIMITED – Naukri.com (Noida)

 Business Development: To interact with clients in B2B segment; interacting with company’s HR and 
hire ups. 

 To provide companies a one stop recruitment solution for their hiring requirements. 

 Customer Relationship Management: Establish business relationship with the Clients to retain them for 
current and future business.

 Look after client’s Pre & Post Sales requirement. 

 Sales Management, keeping a track on the Competition and Preparing MIS. 

 Managing existing named accounts and upgrading them by way of up selling and cross selling. 

 Generation of repeat businesses from existing accounts & fresh orders from ad-hoc clients on a 
monthly/quarter/half year/annual basis.  

 

Company:  CapitalVia Global Research Ltd. (Indore) 

Job Role:  Executive Trainee (May 2014 – July 2015) 

Job Profile: 

 Business Development: To interact with the clients of Singapore and Malaysia in the area of 
International Capital Market (STOCKS, FOREX and COMEX) trading. 

 Dealing with clients to trade on advisable signals generated by the research team. 

 To provide effective tips for trading.  

 Give trial recommendations (if needed) and convert prospects into clients. 

 Relationship Building/Management. 

 In-depth knowledge of trading: To explain the best trading mechanism and trading sectors to each client.  

 Ensure training to all prospects to make them trade in the market. 



 Maintain track of all the trades done by the clients so as to keep the clients updated about their Net 
profit.  

 Update Clients with regular market activities which creates impact on trade. 

 To generate the interest of clients in Equity and Forex trade. 

 Look after the entire sales process. 

 Ensuring targets to be achieved as per given by the management. 
 

SUMMER INTERNSHIP 

 

Company: Godrej & Boyce Mfg. Co. Ltd     

Duration:  45 Days  

Project:  A Comparative Analysis and Brand Awareness of Godrej Vending Machines 

 

ACHIEVEMENTS 

 Recognized as sales smart for a big ticket payment of Rs.1.25 Lac from single client in Naukri.com. 

 Received appreciation in CapitalVia for sharing new ideas to marketing team for lead generation. 

 Appreciation Certificate from Godrej & Boyce Mfg. Co. Ltd.  

 Underwent training in “Skill Development Program” for women by Indian Overseas Bank. 

 Won several prizes in various events like AD-MAD, BODY ROCKERZ, NUKKAD NATAK during 
inter-college competitions held at various B-SCHOOLS.  

 
KEY SKILLS 
 

 B2B and B2C Sales. 

 Customer Relationship Management. 

 MIS. 

 CRM Management, ERP. 

 Existing Client Servicing & Account Management. 

 Negotiation, Lead Generation, Business Strategy & Customer Acquisition.  
 

ACADEMIC QUALIFICATION 

PGDM - Marketing from Institute of Rural Management, Jaipur 2014 
BBA from Mahatma Jyoti Rao Phoole College (Rajasthan University), Jaipur  2011 

 

COMPUTER SKILLS 

Well versed with MS Office (Word, Power, Excel), Social Media, Email Communication and other useful 

computer topics.

Sentiment analysis is one of the most popular research tasks among all the research communities. REST API basically used for collecting data in the xml and JSON format and the streaming API also do the same thing. The data is divided into three parts for three political parties and divided into three categories of positive views, neutral views and negative views depending upon the keywords used in the messages.
